text: Peter Albert Loeb is a mathematician at the University of Illinois at Urbana–Champaign. He co-authored a basic reference text on nonstandard analysis (Hurd–Loeb 1985). Reviewer Perry Smith for MathSciNet wrote: :This book is a welcome addition to the literature on nonstandard analysis.Perry Smith The notion of Loeb measure named after him has become a standard tool in the field.Robert Goldblatt, Lectures on the hyperreals. An introduction to nonstandard analysis. Graduate Texts in Mathematics, 188. Springer-Verlag, New York, 1998.
